summary: A Chicago psychoanalyst's patient and secretary are murdered and he becomes the police's prime suspect despite his claims that someone is trying to frame him.
cast: Roger Moore|Rod Steiger|Elliott Gould|Art Carney|Anne Archer|David Hedison|Deanna Dunagan|Ron Parady|Dick Sollenberger|James Spinks|John Kapelos|Cynthia Baker Schuyler|Virginia Smith|Joe D. Lauck|Jimmie F. Skaggs|Mary Demas|Frankie Hill|Nancy Serlin|Sarah Partridge|Sheila Keenan|Roslyn Alexander|Ron Beattie|Cyndi Maxey|Rosemary Schoeninger|Jerry Tullos|Edward L. Burba|Will Zahrn|Paul Ilmer|Michael E. Meyers|Ann Coyle|Rob Maxey|Les Podewell|John T. Stibich|Carmelo Melendez|Richard Henzel|Mark Houston|Jeffery Feathergill|Jeff Jenkins|Corney Morgan|Marty Allen|Mike Bacarella|George Barrow|Joe DeBartolo|Synthia Hardy|Robert Minkoff|Joe Pressel|Phil Ranstrom
title: A cara descubierta
